root: ^Come on, since I'm starting to doubt you have the capacity

PART2: ^to understand what I'm saying if I keep trying to be subtle,
PART3: ^let me just teach you how to properly play an art piece.
PART4: ^See here? See the details of the flower?
PART5: ^How amazingly textured it is, with all the perfect details and perfect assymetry it has?
PART6: ^THAT is the flower I meant, did you actually notice it the first time?
PART7: ^Even if you did, I don't even think you took a second glance to it.
PART8: ^Are you really that oblivious or are you just used to boring, commercial games?
PART9: ^We've given our sweat, blood and tears into this thing,
PART10: ^poured absolute meaning and beauty in every single detail and we did it all in less than 48 hours,
PART11: ^and you're telling me you can't give a single hour, nay, half-hour to a game?
